short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore the web while enjoying serene landscapes with every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab experience into a journey of tranquility and inspiration with our unique Chrome extension. With every new tab you open, be greeted by breathtaking landscapes that transport you away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Serenity Search extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab search to Microsoft Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Privacy Policy: http://serenity-search.com/pages/privacy.html
